code: import React from'react';import'./BookCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookCard=_ref=>{let{book,onClick}=_ref;const renderStars=rating=>{return'⭐'.repeat(rating)+'☆'.repeat(5-rating);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-card",onClick:onClick,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-image-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:book.thumbnailUrl,alt:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stock-badge ".concat(book.inStock?'in-stock':'out-stock'),children:book.stockAvailability})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"book-rating",children:renderStars(book.rating)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-price",children:["\xA3",book.price.toFixed(2)]})]})]});};export default BookCard;
